detail_desc: Ankle-length culottes in cotton denim. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt. Pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with elastication at the top and overlocked, scalloped edges. Extra low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boots in leather with a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Skater skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Round sunglasses with sidepieces in metal and plastic and slim frames trimmed with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a narrow trim at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Soft organic cotton jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Short dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with ties at the front, and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with hole-knit details, long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Slippers in a soft knit with embroidery and appliqués. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Hair elastic decorated with a large bow.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top.
Blouse in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Frilled yoke, an opening and button at the back of the neck, and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The fingerless gloves have a motif on the uppers. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.

Playsuit in a linen weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the top. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and an extra layer of fabric at each side with a tie detail at the front.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Metal rings in various designs.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave. Detachable hood with an elasticated edge and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the waist, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend with a small stand-up collar with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. V-neck front and back, long sleeves and a seam at the waist.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a lace yoke at the top and small frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped, lined skirt.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a small print motif at the top. Side stripes, contrasting colour panels at the knees and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in glittery jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck in a slightly shorter, boxy fit with a straight hem. Long raglan sleeves with block-coloured sections.

Popover running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details, a hood and a zip at the top with a chin guard. Partially loose yoke at the back. long sleeves with ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded, drawstring hem. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh.

Imitation suede sandals with narrow ankle straps with lacing at the front and covered heels. Imitation leather linings, imitation suede insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 10 cm.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch denim with a collar, metal buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut kimono in woven fabric with a pattern at the hem, cut-out sections under the arms and no fasteners.
Pouch in transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 9x10x18 cm.
Flared, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, wide, detachable belt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue and loop at the back. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short, fitted, double-breasted dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and satin lapels. Long sleeves, flap welt front pockets, covered buttons at the front and a concealed safety button at the hem. Lined.
Long coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length shirt dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, press-studs down the front and a button band with a decorative tab at the top. Large patch front pockets and extra-long wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the top, belt loops with a press-stud, and a detachable tie belt with elastication in the middle. Slit at the back.
Cardboard glasses in various sizes and designs.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Sweatshirt in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués, twisted side seams and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and flap back pockets. Tapered legs with gathered seams and a zip at the hems.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short, faux shearling-lined parka in a cotton weave with a faux fur-trimmed hood, stand up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud and concealed side pockets. Covered elastication and a tab with an adjustable fastening at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a small back vent. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with fully lined triangular cups with removable inserts. Narrow shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Flared skirt in flock-print tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Belt in sturdy canvas with a text print and metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Oversized cardigan knitted in soft chenille yarn with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and open front pockets.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with a tongue and lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Adjustable straps with a metal buckle around the ankle and over the foot. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5 cm. Platform 4.5 cm.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar with a tie and opening at the back and seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Long sleeves with a double frill at the shoulders and a drawstring and flounce at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with short sleeves, a wrapover front and open back with wide ties at the hem.
Top in viscose jersey with cap sleeves and a lace yoke at the front.
Non-wired lace bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Off-the-shoulder, V-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with inset lace sections and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Hooded jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 6x15.5x20.5 cm.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, decorative straps at the top, a lined gusset, narrow sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Short blouse in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and ties at the hem.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
